perturbation.changed_text: Heritage agrees to provide to Premier each FDA Form 483 and any related Establishment Inspection Report ("EIR") that is received from the FDA by Heritage or Jasper, along with any response provided to the regulatory authority by Heritage or Jasper, as long as this Agreement is in effect. perturbation.changed_text: Either Party may terminate this Agreement immediately without notice should the other Party fail to cure, within 1 day after receipt of written notice thereof, any material breach of its obligations or duties hereunder, provided, however that in the event of a material breach that cannot be cured within 1 day, a Party shall not be deemed in default if it commences curing such default within the 1 day period, notifies the other Party of that commencement by e-mail, and thereafter cures such default within 1 day of the original written notice thereof.
